content.detailedDescription: Not a ufo sighting but a ufl (unidentified flash of light) so bright it was like the sun came out for 1 more second at 9:20pm in tucson. i called the local news and reported it, they said that several other people witnessed the same thing. my buddy (leo) was outside with me and said "if i didn't see it myself, i wouldn't have believed you" (he's very skeptical) my wife was kicking back with us on the back porch and i was facing south toward davis monthan air force base but i would say that this light seemed to come from above or at least to my north. (not from the base) my wife was facing north and did not see this event. there was no noise related to the event even after waiting to hear something like an explosion. not a cloud in the sky for as far as the eye could see. the news came on 40 minutes later and doplar radar showed no cloud in the sky for at least 60-80 miles. again, not a ufo sighting but an unexplained light event.
content.summary: The tucson sky lit up, like the sun came out for 1 second. not a cloud in the sky as far as the eye could see. i could see the outline of the mountains to the south!

content.detailedDescription:
I believe this was what was referred to as the hanover lights. for about an hour one evening my whole family, mom, dad, brother and my self watched three very high altitude fast moving objects/lighted surfaces do maneuvers that are impossible for a regular aircraft to perform. i later did 20 years 55-75 in the navy and know what impossible aircraft maneuvers are. 

being only about 12-15 yo i had no idea of what i was seeing. later i saw something in print {?} in a newspaper or magazine about a strange set of unexplained lights in the sky and they were referred to as the hanover lights. the lights were in the northern sky from our place and that would put them toward hanover pa.

on one other occasion a long cylindrical/cigar shaped object at fairly low altitude passed directly over our farm. it had a long rectangular lighted surface on the side visible to us on the ground, was silent except for a very low ?Humm? for lack of a better word. my dad passed both sightings off as "something military" and of course who was i to doubt my dad?
content.summary: Fast moving strange lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back patio watching the 10pm news when i saw a red round object in the sky which was glowing.  i wondered what it was but did not get up to look closer ( i was in my screened in patio).   a few minutes later 2 more of the same objects flew overhead.  i then called my husband who had gone to bed to come out and verify that i indeed was not seeing things.  he also witnessed the objects flying over our house from east to southwest.  he had never seen anything like this either.  it was not a helicopter as there was no sound at all.  we live close to hopkins airport and are used to hearing and seeing airplanes but this made no noise at all.  i called the brook park police department (they probably think i am crazy)and asked them to go out and look.  the dispatcher said "well even if we see it i'm not sure what we can do"  i suggested that maybe we should call nasa glenn research center and report it but she didn't seem to be believing me.  she said she would make a note of my call.  both my husband and i watched it until it disappeared from sight.  i can't believe that no one else in the area saw this but my husband and i.  have you received any other reports of this?  i have seen meteors and shooting stars in my life and i have also seen planets and satelites in the sky.  this was nothing like any of those things.  it moved slowly and glowed red.  

it was one of the weirdest things i have ever seen.  the next morning when i got up i asked my husband if in fact it did happen and i was not dreaming.  he verified that indeed he had also seen it.  he only saw the two but in all there were three.
content.summary: Witnessed red glowing objects overhead flying from east to southwest.

content.detailedDescription: At 9:48 p.M. as i laid in bed listening to the radio, i began to hear this very loud, wharbling, whistling sound. it was not something i had heard before, so i made my way to the window to see what the heck it was. as i did, a bright, very fast moving light came from the sw heading towards the ne. it was  much faster then any plane or helicopter and was not a shooting star or meteor. it then came to a complete stop for about 10 seconds and i get the best look at it. it was cigar shaped, with one signal strobing light that overtook the whole craft. when it stopped so did the noise and everything was just silent. it then took off again, and the noise came roaring back. however when it tokk off, it did not go in a straight line, it did almost a half moon arch down even lower to the ground and then went straight away. we all have seen planes and the like at night and this was without a doubt not one. it was far to fast and like i said it stopped "on a dime", and then the angle it took down after that was way to insane to be a plane of some sort. this location is right in my backyard in glenside, about 10 minutes from the willow grove mall. oh, and after whatever it was took off, every bird on the block(who should have all been sleeping), started going crazy and did not stop for at least half an hour.
content.summary: A loud, wharbling, whistling sound followed by a fast, bright strobing light.

content.detailedDescription: I was throwing some trash in the dumpster where i work when i happened to notice a light flash high in the sky.. i imediatly attempted to locate the object but was unable to see it at first.. appoximately 10-20 seconds later it flashed again and allowed me to get a better fix on the area..Again another 10-20 seconds passed before it flashed again.. this time i was able to focus on the object.. it appeared to be at an extremely high altitude far higher than any planes in the area fly..Again another 10-20 seconds passed and it flashed again.. i continued to watch the object fly in a northeast direction... the object flashed one more time approximately 10-20 seconds after the last one then completely disappeared..I see satellites fly by on a nightly basis.. and shortly after this diappeared a satellite passed by in the same general area and was noticably closer than the object that i observed as well as far brighter in intensity..The flashes looked as though the light took a second to reach where i was as if it flashed then the full intensity of the light would come though a second later.. at first i thought i might just be seeing things.. then after locating and fixing on the position in the sky which eventually was directly over my head in a completely clear sky with minimal light interference.. as soon as the sighting ended i went straight to my vehicle and wrote down exactly what happened as well as times and weather conditions.. the sighting gave me further proof that something is going on in the skys over west texas and eastern new mexico as this is no where near the first thing i have seen.. and i doubt it will be the last
content.summary: Light flashing from extremely high altitude at long intervals.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking dog...Clear night. observed two star-like objects, at what appeared to be a great distance away (perhapse in orbit).  they were traveling at a constant very fast speed from north to south in unison,as if they were sychronized.  from my point of view the two objects stayed a hand width apart while following each other, then the first object continued it's quick pace south but the second blew my mind.  it slowed down and grew with brightness in size 4 to 5 times it's original size.  it seemed like it was pointing a light right at me for about 1-2 seconds.  long enough to wonder if it were coming my way.  then it's brightness shrank back to original size and the the second traveled east and upward into space till it became so small i lost sight.  the first continued on past my sight from n to ssw.

neither object showed flashing lights.  i suppose the first could have been some fast man-made jet, but the second was freaky.  i'm in my 40's, live on a farm, seen jets, shooting stars, walk everynight, retired deputy sheriff...Never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Two star-like objects following each other at a great speed and elevation, traveling north to south.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out in the backyard smoking a cigarette when i looked up and noticed a weird object in the sky. it was no more than a few hundred feet up and almost directly above the house. as i was watching it, i was trying to think of what it could be. there was aircraft noise but as soon as the airplane that was nearby passed, it was silent. i stood there watching it for a good while. no noise, nothing coming out of it. it was hovering and twisting in and around itself as it did so. it did this for about 7 minutes when it seemed to all clump together and it started heading upwards. as it was going up, it lit up in bright white lights. it hovered for about a minute or two longer and then suddenly disappeared. i'm a believer in ufo's and i have seen some anomalous activity before but never in daylight and never so close. it was amazingly clear to the naked eye and i can imagine i wasn't the only one to have seen it. i don't know how long it had been there as it had just caught my eye while i was outside. i tried to capture it on my cheap phone but got nothing. i wanted to run into the house to get my camcorder but i remembered that my camcorder battery was dead and i had no idea where my girlfriend's camera was. i texted her right away to tell her what i was witnessing. she told me to get her camera but i was hesitant to go looking for it because i was amazed at what i was witnessing and didn't want to miss one second of it. now that i didn't capture it, i'm a greatly disappointed because it was amazing and wish i had something to back up my story other than just my own retelling.
content.summary: Shape-shifting ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
In the country fields of johnston county. we were looking at the stars and talking about ufo's and the possibilities of life when we were both facing the south and looking directly at the big dipper.  now if you were to point towards the dipper and then draw your hand down 45 degrees facing south..This is the point of the sky we were observing.  after a few minutes a bright light appeared with no origin - meaning you did not see it move from left to right as in the path of direction in flight but directly center of where we both were looking.  it flashed brightly then would vanish for a few seconds then it would appear again but distance farther again not going right or left but towards space.
i asked my friend if he saw it and as soon as the flash would appear we would alternate confirming the object.  it was not a dual flash like most planes and it was inconsistent in length of delay between appearing and vanishing.  we wanted to believe it was a plane because it seemed corny and wishful seeing that the object would just appear after talking about it but after we both discussed the possibilities to justify the flashes it was a standstill and we had to accept what we were seeing.  again - the fact this object seemed within the atmosphere of earth as to its brightness and closeness compared to the other stars and to show up without any origin has us mystified.
content.summary: Bright light flashes every few seconds as it slowly faded into the distance towards space with no origin.

content.detailedDescription:
About 3 years ago the witness was driving down 52 east when she observed 2 very bright lights circled with a rainbow color halo.  there was some steam or smoke coming from the back of the lights.  she became very afraid because the lights where right above her.  she felt she might be abducted or something. she really became afraid when the light shined in her car right on her face on the drivers side of the car.  she doesn't remember much else just that she was afraid and could not wait to get home.  she never told anyone until she told her grandson.

janet moore has had another sighting about 40 years ago.  her and her husband observed a saucer shape craft with multi color windows going around the center of the saucer.  she was just across the street from the saucer.  it was just above a building, hoovering, making no sound.  it was huge about 60 ft. long.  she does not know why but they did not stay and watch it.  again she did not tell anyone until her grandson got more intvolved in his sightings.

janet was also a witness to her daughters sighting about 2 weeks prior to her grandsons sighting on 5-12-2009.  she saw a oval light just above the trees that was very bright.  just as she saw it, it vanished.
content.summary: Two large bright lights circled  by a colorful halo, shined light in her face

content.detailedDescription:
Drove up onto black bank, knutton, because of the very good views up there.  the night sky was unusually light tonight. i had just returned from delivering some photos to a colleague. i'd been working on them late.

i couldn't see a suitable place to park so drove back down the bank and as i did i noticed the red light.

say a red light appear from the south east over stoke on trent.  it disappeared but reappeared quite low, seemed to be moving northwards then slowed right down.  remained in same area for a long time.  managed to take some photos but without a tripod they were a bit blurry.  some shots do show light in the sky and some suggest a solid shape.

its actions were unremarkable really save to say that whatever it was it was pretty low.  it moved slowly, but not in any special or eye catching way.  a couple of times i thought i saw other objects but cant be sure. 

at first i thought it might be a plane, but it was too low, then i wondered if it might have been the police helicopter but they usually have a searchlight when hovering.

the object was observable for a few minutes and then just disappeared.
content.summary: Bright red light appearing then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
Murrysville, pa:  after multiple night time sightings including bright pinpoint flashes, i wondered if daytime "glints" were related and not just my eyes messing with me.  after researching, i ordered an x-nite xdr ir infrared) filter for my new hd sony camcorder hdr-xr500. i had just received it on the 12th.

getting ready to leave the house at 12:27 pm, i was sitting at my vanity table with a window above it in my bedroom.  glancing up, i saw those "glints" again in the sky above the 40ft. pine trees in yard.  so, i ran and got the camcorder and put the filter on and shot through the window glass.  it only took about a minute to catch it on film whizzing by to the right. the 2 kids were in the garden and perhaps it wanted to check them out.

i'm posted two still frame pictures here of blowups from that video.  it seems to have a flat bottom and block-ish in shape in one still, but different looking in each frame-by-frame.  there were other things caught with this method during the 2 minute shoot, but this one was undeniably not a plane/bird/bug etc.

there is a cool mechanical whizzing sound when it goes by and strange horizontal streaks on some stills.  perhaps the ufo affected the camcorder or it's from some other cause.  

the video footage was captured in hd 1920 x 1080i and the large hd movie file is uploaded on my youtube channel named:  seeingufospa

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=wjhk8axzolw 

check it out!
content.summary: Murrysville: square-ish ufo daytime capture w/infrared filter & nightshot.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness observed the oval shape light just above the trees outside of her and her mothers house.  she watched it for a few seconds and then yelled for her mother to look.  just after the mother observed the same light it vanished.  
this was just about 2 weeks prior to her sons sighting on 5-12-2009.  

witness has also had other sightings:

she had a sighting with her son about the year 1998.  they observed a bight light over a mobil home about a telephone pole long.  it took off to the south at a high speed.   

the witness also observed a triagular craft just above the trees above her house.  this sighting happened around (2008), 6 months prior to the current sighting. it had white lights on each corner and a red light in the middle.
content.summary: Bright light, oval shape, silver lining, about 6 to 7 ft. long

content.detailedDescription: Exactly around 3:30 am my wife and i were sitting outside talking when this very bright sort of orange or amber glowing light appeared in the sky.  now, in my backyard there's a cluster of small trees that obscure the sky so when i say "appeared" i think that it might have come from that area.  as soon as i saw it i immediately jumped up moved to get a better look (there's a few big pine trees in my yard). it was very bright and pulsating and slowly moving west.  i will also say that it closely resembled a very bright venus in the early night sky.  sort of star like.  now it only lasted about about a minute and a half then just vanished.  i have seen a flare before and this was no flare. it was way to high up in the sky.  there were no planes near and no noise. now, i do not think i would have posted that had it not been for another event similar to this.  my wife and i were on a vacation recently (much needed) when we saw something very similar to this. we were on the beach, probably around 9:30 pm, there was a full moon so the sky was very lit up.  i was just gazing up at the stars when i noticed one that seemed oddly bright and colored(orangish).  i also noticed that it seemed to be moving very slowly.  not being the expert here, it is impossible to gauge the height and speed in which it was moving.  but, we all three saw it and then it just slowly faded out of sight.  as if it were moving up and out, not across.  this lasted about 5 minutes. i have seen plenty of satellites.  i do not believe it to have been a satellite.  that date was july 7th, 2009.  just thought i would share these two experiences and i'm glad there is a place to share it. :)
content.summary: Bright orange pulsating sphere appeared moving slowely in the sky then just vanished

content.detailedDescription: We was just coming from seing a movie, me and my roommate. i was driving and he was napping in the passenger side. the time was approximately a little after 2am. i usually take the same route home everytime i go to this particular theater but for some reason i missed (the main road) to take us home and i had to make a uturn to get back on track, thats when i see lights that at first looked like a typical commercial airliner but when it came in closer i clearly seen it was something totally different beyond belief!! the road i needed turn down to go home was about 2 blocks away but my eyes was glued to the object, which i was able to take'em off of it for a few seconds to see did my sudden stop of the vehicle awake my roommate but it did not and a matter-of-fact, i had to nudge him a few times which wasn't very effective either and by no means, i was not gonna miss this!! the object flew down and stopped right over some trees and power towers. as it was coming to a stop, something about it startled me, the shape of it was in a perfect triangle and it shined with a glowy semi-bright orangey light but when it stopped it flipped right side up into a pyramid shape right over the power towers and trees. i was wowwwwd!!! i should mention i heard no sounds of an aircraft engine or any type of engine for that matter just "airbursts". what was even more amazing was we was'nt that far away from the airport and macdill airforce base, right in between the two so i just knew it was being detected or radarred or something you would think huh? then it happened, from beneath the power lines what seemed to be below the ground, something that might be described as an orb? it was a ultra-violet/purple looking round transparent sphere with what appeared to be lightning bolts inside it. i immediately took it as some type of power source for fuel because as that was happening a strange sound occurred like a generator it kind of vacuumed the orb up in absorbed it into the object which it brightened up then and it repeated this process three more times before it got as bright as the sun like you can literally see the night turn day then took off like the starship enterprise.
content.summary: Pyramid/triangular shaped.

content.detailedDescription:
Well one night when i was 14 or 15 in 1994 i belive me and my so called friend where just hanging out at my parents house and my friend said let's go out side for some fresh air so i said sure.Then he noteiced an airplane and said that it look like it was going to crash.I did not see anything!So we went down the driveway and we saw a landed u.F.O. disk shaped with alot of differend colored lights flashing in a horasantal pattern so i was watching the lights and next thing i know i am standing back at the end of driveway and no u.F.O. but my intuiuion told me to look up into the sky and i saw what looked like an airplane untell a sideways lightning bolt flashed and the ship dissipeared.Then i ran up driveway and my friend was like what are you doing.Like he did not even care abought what just happened i went inside and my brother said i was gone for a lond time i figger it took me 1 and a half hours to walk down the driveway and back.I am always seeing weird things in the sky nowadays last thing i saw was a brown disk shaped almost seethrough fly by my appartment slowley and then fly to canada.I have had nightmares abought u.F.O.S hear is how my dream went i was happy walking with 4 frineds when i saw a dot in the sky then my friend wher frozen in time kinda shaking back and forth then the sky turned red and the u.F.O. was doing airal monuvers that when unreal so i ran i went into a house and it was dark and dirty there was some gross food boiling on plates on a tabel and i finley woke up after haveing dogs bite my privits in my dream.It was probley the most scary nightmare in my 15 year nightmare every night campain.
if you can help me look of implants or just with dealing with this nightmare i call life.
content.summary: Abduction.

content.detailedDescription:
This event was related to me casually by a local carpenter working at my house this winter, 2008-2009, named [cms/tg/pid], aged 27.  he was about 21
at the time of the sighting.  he told me while driving home on rt. 1 in south kingstown, near perryville, heading northerly, with the matunuck beach exit on his right, he saw ahead what he thought was a low flying plane or helicopter with bright searchlights shining down, illuminating the road ahead.  as he got closer he realized it was neither, but a triangular shaped object, black, with a row of 3 bright white lights at the rear shining down on to the road surface.  he stopped about 100 yds in front of the object, got out, and watched in disbelief at this large, silent object, floating over the road and then drifting southerly toward matunuck town beach and the small community of mary and roy capenters beach shanties.  there were no other cars on the deserted road and no other witnesses that he knows of.  he said it 'freaked him out' and he drove home fast to wakefield.  he only related this to me because i told him about my close encounter in perryville nearby to where he saw this similar object.  he said he had no missing time or other unusual disturbances.
content.summary: Large black triange with 3 oval very bright lights at rear shining down on road.

content.detailedDescription:
***i have cropped the images on all but one of the object i saw. the one large file is just an original .Tiff file from the bunch.***

i have been watching the skies for a good couple of years at ciggie breaks and lunchtimes, and when ever i have a cigarette in the garden at home. i am about 10-15 miles approx from heathrow airport and the sky above me is a pretty busy place most of the time. tonight though i was in the garden have a smoke looking at the sky as i always do, and i got a glint of something shiny high up in the sky. i thought could this be it my first ufo? i watched and this glinting seemed very strange but so so far away i didn't know what it could be. i watched for about a 2 minutes and it remained in the same place. visual explanation of what i was looking at is not easy, just was not anything normal. i decided to take a chance and run for the camera, i took about 4 .Jpg files and 9.Tiff files. just holding down the shutter. i decided at this point to grab the binoculars as they were only 10 feet away in the kitchen, i ran for them, and in that matter of seconds it was gone! leaving me very disappointed that i had not seen it closer up, but very happy that for me i believe i was looking at something not from this world .. possibly.
content.summary: Pictures of possible ufo high in sky london, june 23, 2009.

content.detailedDescription: Returning from a night class at the univ. of rhode island, i approached the intersection of post rd. and ministerial rd whereupon i noticed a huge, perhaps 20 ft in diameter, yellowish white circle of light hovering above a house at the above intersection.  i knew it should not be there, so i drove to the closest point under the light near pitcher's garage, but closer to the intersection.  the light just hovered, made no sound, so i got out of my car to get a better look...I could barely make out the very dark outline of the craft, about the size of a small jet liner..I think i remember another white light at the other 'wing tip.'  in the center of the craft was a small 'electric green' flashing light, a medium pretty shade of green. one car came out of a side lane next to me but quickly sped off..I don't know if they saw the craft and paniced or what, but they drove off in a hurry.  i stayed and watched the craft.  no other people were on the street.  as i observed the craft i had a feeling of time slowing down right where i was...An odd feeling.  otherwise, nothing unusual.  the craft then slowly pivoted, very smoothly, and drifted north on ministerial rd and perhaps to the east a bit, over the treeline, where i lost sight of it.  i then called the south kingstown police to report it. the dispatcher, a woman, took my call seriously but reported no one else reporting this object.  i gave her a description of the craft.  i then drove the two miles home in amazement of what i saw.  there was no missing time or other phenomenom.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Low, hovering, dark chevron craft with huge white light, small green light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving work about 3:45 a.M. on the morning in question and noticed a very bright light in low in the sky to the east.  at first i though it was a police helicopter hovering over downtown because of the intensity of the light, but as i began to drive that direction home i could tell that the light was further to the east than i thought.  when i got home i went out to my balcony and took these photographs and video.

the light didn't move from its position for over 2 hours until just as the sun was coming up.  it then slowly moved up and to the south which negates the possibility of the light being a celestial body of some sort.

there is a military base to the east of denver, but dia (the airport) is out in that direction as well so the light couldn't have gone unnoticed.
content.summary: Intense bright light in eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription: I came out of my back door at 2:30 am to smoke a cigarette.  i looked up and saw two flashing lights. red and white.  they did not move.  i observed for about 10 min then ran in to get my camera. at first i thought they were planes.  but there was little to no movement.  one moved a little more than the other.  when i got back out only one was left as far as i could see.  i could not get a picture.  my screen was black.  i continued to watch it.  very little movement.  it would move at slight angles very short distances.  i ran into my house at 2:30am, and when i came back out it was gone.
content.summary: Two small red and white flashing lights that did not move in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: The video is faced east.
content.summary: We thought it was a bright planet

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst watching an evening soccer match at a sports club in houghton johannesburg, south africa, myself and several other parents and children at first noticed a large orange orb-like structure moving slowly from north to south and was very high up.  after a few minutes this stopped moving and just hovered stationary in the sky.  soon thereafter 4 others followed in the same sequence, height and distance from each other forming a line at a slight 45 degree angle.  these too stopped moving and just hovered in the sky. a few minutes later one by one and in order they moved at a 90 degree angle upwards into the night sky until they disappeared.  this took several minutes.  about l5 minutes later, another 7 followed from the same direction and in exactly the same way.  they too disappeared very slowly upwards until they were out of sight.  this whole process took around a half hour.  during this time a light small plane and helicopter was seen flying well below these orbs, so we could easily see the difference and wondered if these planes had spotted them. everybody on the field was distracted and very excited about what we were seeing.  it was almost surreal to us, as it was a sighting nobody ever thought they would see. 

after returning home i called the local airports and around town to confirm that nothing out of the ordinary was going on, which wasnt.  i called the radio stations to report this incredible sighting and emailed the local newspaper who did publish an article about this sighting.  in response, other people reported seeing this sighting too in the area that night.  one man confirmed he saw exactly the same kind of sighting 40 years in johannesburg with his wife and daughter and has never forgotten this.  

all of us were amazed at this unbelievable sighting and were very excited, but confused as to what these could have been. unfortunately nobody had a strong enough lensed camera to try and take photos and we only had cellphone cameras on us.  with the lights from the field, we could not capture any good photos. 

this was an experience that we all shared together and will never forget.
content.summary: Several orange orbs seen moving one at a time and then stopped for several minutes before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a direct plight path of pdx. planes fly over my house daily. in fact, a plane flew by at 4:44 this morning; it probably landed around 4:48 and it is very possible someone on that plane saw it.
this was a very bright, white "star" but much lower than we could normally see a star and day was breaking and no other stars were visible. it wasn't the flashing green/red that we all used to see so often in the '70's. i thought about a satelite but it stayed completely stationary for a full hour and i don't know if satelites do that. it was in the eastern sky, i can't tell you how high up but i would say that if a plane were that low i would at the least be able to make out that it was a plane. i really dreaded contacting you since i did this one before and we determined we saw a satelite and two planets all on the same night. i questioned at first if that was all it was but decided i was sure about it so left it at that. this time however, i really can't guess what it could be so... being aware of your knowledge of the goings on in the portland skies i thought i would just check in and perhaps you could enlighten me. i don't know how long it was out there but i finally came inside after standing there freezing for an hour. as far as "where" in the sky....The best way i could describe it would be it looked like it was directly above the cascade outlets in troutdale. it is quite possible that it was further east than that but i would guess that would be the vicinity regarding it's position. anyway, so i'm probably sounding like a nut by now but i really wonder if the pilot or passengers on the plane this morning saw it and mostly wonder if it is in fact "un" identified.
thanks for your time,
terri
content.summary: Walked out to patio, saw very bright light. maybe planet but odd place for planet.

content.detailedDescription:
It is a particularly bright star night, no moon, very good sky detail.  i was  on a very dark street away from light pollution walking dog.  flashes in sky caught my eye.  i found the point and noted it to be moving slowly from east to west (approx) and alternating between a faint white pulse and a bright white pulse.  the pulses were not at regular intervals.  the object could be failty made out (very dim) between pulses.  i noticed another object more to the south and moving in a similar direction but more to the sw than w.  it exhibited the same irregular pulses.  there were at least 2 aircraft visible in the sky during this time with their distinct red/blue/white strobes. this did not seem to be like a satelite which may become brighter or dimmer as it traverses the sky but it remains more constant due to its illumination by the sun.

i was puzzled by this object's irregular pulsating patern, one expects an aircraft or to have a very predictable strobe patern and of course the expected colors of aircraft strobes.  this object seemed to be in space, its color was that of the surrounding stars but it was moving in a plane that was not consistant with a satelite.  the second object was moving at a similar speed but in a slightly different direction to the southwest.

i had to tend to the dog who was getting restless as i stood in the road staring at the sky for over 10 minutes.  once i returned to my house i lost view of the part of the sky where the objects were.
content.summary: 2 pulsating points moving e to w, irregular interval flashes.

content.detailedDescription: I was at gross reservoir from all night fishing on the southern boat ramp. during dawn, 5:30 am or so, a strange sound came up the canyon from the west that sounded like a loud humming sound, very fast vibration like a humming bird.  i looked to my left and saw two objects moving low across the water. the objects then made a hard left turn and accelerated at a high rate of speed over the mountains.  the objects were hard to make out as they seemed to warp light. the objects looked to be the size of a hot-tub.  they had the appearance of black stars that "twinkled" with black rays of distortion.  when they turned they turned in formation and retained  consistent distance form each other the whole time. they also banked to the left  in unison during the turn as if it where one object. they moved in such a way that it was evident that they were not using aerodynamics for propulsion or maneuvering. i would guess that they were moving at 30-50 mph over the lake and over 600 mph as they moved away. my best guess is that these are government vehicles,  but who knows.
content.summary: Two small sized objects swoop in over water at "low" speed, turn in formation and take off at high rate, strange humming sound.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and two friends were stargazing in sioux city, iowa. at about 8:30 pm, when we noticed a triangular shaped craft moving at an extremely high speed  at a very high altitude.I didn't know what it was. it had a red-yellow light and zig-zagged. and then it stopped and hovered for a while. then we noticed another one come and do the same thing. and then another one came and did the same thing. the crafts seemed to make a triangular formation. i ran inside to get my telescope. when i came back out my two friends and i looked up to see they had vanished. about three minutes later they returned to sky. about fifteen minutes later, they left at incredible speed up into the sky and we did not see them again. below is a sketch we made showing the formation of the craft.
content.summary: Triangular objects with single red-yellow light fly at high speed into triangle formation.

content.detailedDescription: You have been waiting for don and i do you have updated questions i am to arrive at sakonnet point
content.summary: Will look like a sea bird.

content.detailedDescription: 3 flying orange lights flying in a triangle than they made a left hand turn one by one the lights faded we watched them for 5 min. it was very strange way above the three orange lights there was a airplane we could see the flashing lights, we just have no idea what the 3 oragne lights were
content.summary: 3 orange glowing ufos flying in a triangle then one by one the lights faded.

content.detailedDescription:
I had opened our garage door and was walking some trash to the garbage can on the street for next day pick-up. just above the neighbors tree across the street, i noticed a very bright object. i first thought it was an airplane with landing lights on. but almost immediately dismissed that idea. number one, my house isn't in line with a major airport unless the aircraft is approaching from the north/north east (this object was west northwest). number two, i noticed that it was "rotating" its' colors (unlike an aircraft with stationary wingtip and tail lights). number three was that it was stationary, like a star but obviously not.

i watched it for several minutes. when i realized that it wasn't moving off, i ran into the house to get my camera and tripod. i had enough time to mount the camera, get back outside and set it up... it was still there! just hovering way off in the distance. so i zoomed in on it the best my little cam could do and shot some video. (i've attached that video to this report. the camera is a kodak easy share z612. unfortunately, the auto focus motors are audible when viewing the video. sorry about that.) in the video, it appears that the object goes completely dark every second and a half or so... it didn't. it's just that my cam couldn't pick up the "dim times". i was watching it the whole time, it would go dim then bright, dim and bright, all the while with the rotating colors.

this may sound a little dumb, but i'd heard that there a a few people who can and have contacted visitors vessels psychically. that when this was done, the object would move toward the person... hover, etc. i tried this to no avail. it just hung in the sky like a multi-colored, multi-faceted rotating gem. i was unable to put a "shape" to it because it was just too far away.

"t" [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Bright night object rotating colors.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my backyard with my cat and my canon sx10is digital camera snapping photos of mission peak (mountain).  i was trying out the different modes the camera has.  when i was in aquarium mode i decided what the hell snap some photos see what they look like.  in the viewer it looked like the sky was much bluer then in any other mode. it was not until i downloaded the photos to my computer and reviewed them on the larger screen that there was this whitish dot.  after zooming on the picture closer is when i noticed that it was not a bird but a possible ufo.  i have more then 1 photo of this object and it shows up in other parts of the photos.  i know it is not a star since it shows up on other photos in other spots. i know for a fact there is no lint on my lens since i clean it all the time.  i also know for a fact that it is not an airplane cause there was no planes in the sky at the time. i went back out back and started taking more photos and suddenly this black helicopter showed up which unfortunately i was not able to get the entire copter in but you can see the tail section. it was headed towards moffett field. the photos i am including were taken on the same day the helicopter is earlier then the ufo photo that i posted but the ufo was there prior to helicopter showing up.  i only posted the better of the ufo photos that i currently have taken.
content.summary: Photo taken of whitish metal looking object in the sky
